name: Superdeveloper
description:
A game that glamourises game development.

Submission for the AIE Christmas Game Jam 2022.

Superdeveloper is a game development power fantasy in which players manipulate the environment with programming, art, and game design to take down an endless horde of enemies. Mechanics are designed to not only imitate basic actions associated with each of these disciplines, but also the unique ways of thinking they each appeal to and require.

Controls:

WASD - move

Left mouse - shoot

Right mouse - melee

Left shift - dodge (can pass through attacks)

Q - enter art mode (if art meter has resources)

E - enter programming mode (if programming meter has resources)

R - enter design mode (if design meter has resources)

Gain resources for the three developer abilities by defeating enemies and dodging attacks

Created by Riley Kopfstein (Game Design) and Logan Baker (Programming)
